question: Palestine a UN member state before U.S. election?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Palestine or any Palestinian territories are admitted into the UN as an official Member State by November 4, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

A 'Member State' refers to a state with full United Nations membership and voting rights, excluding observer states and non-member entities.

The primary resolution source for this market will be official information from the United Nations, however a consensus of credible resources will also be used.

events.title: Palestine a UN member state before U.S. election?

question: NBA: Cleveland Cavaliers vs. Orlando Magic 2024-04-22
description:
This market refers to Game 2 of the NBA Playoff series between the Cleveland Cavaliers and Orlando Magic. 

If the Cleveland Cavaliers win, the market will resolve to “Cavaliers”.

If the Orlando Magic win, the market will resolve to “Magic”.

If the game is not completed by April 28, 2024 11:59 PM ET, the market will resolve 50-50.

question: Peter Salovey out as Yale President in April?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Peter Salovey ceases to be President of Yale University for any length of time from April 21, 2024 through April 30, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

An announcement of his resignation before this market's end date will immediately resolve this market to "Yes", regardless of when the announced resignation goes into effect.

This market's resolution source will be official statements from Yale University or a consensus of credible reporting.

events.title: Peter Salovey out as Yale President in April?

question: Columbia resumes in-person classes by Wed?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if on-campus in-person classes resume at Columbia University by April 24, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

In-person classes resuming is defined as a majority of classes on Tuesday or Wednesday as having an in-person option to attend. Classes resuming on Thursday or later will have no bearing on this market.

The primary resolution source for this market will be official information from Columbia University, however a consensus of credible sources will also be used.

events.title: Columbia resumes in-person classes by Wed?

question: Will Trump be Speaker by July 1?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Donald J. Trump is Speaker of the House in the US Congress for any length of time by July 1, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

This market may only resolve to "No" once the end date has passed and Trump has not been Speaker of the House for any length of time.

The primary resolution source for this market will be official information from the US government, however a consensus of credible reporting will also be used.

events.title: Will Trump be Speaker by July 1?

question: Ding Liren plays in 2024 World Chess Championship?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Ding Liren plays in the World Chess Championship 2024. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

If it is definitively determined/announced that Ding Liren will not participate in the World Chess Championship 2024, this market may immediately resolve to "No". Otherwise, this market will only resolve once Ding Liren plays his first move in the 2024 World Chess Championship.

The primary resolution source for this market will be official information from FIDE, organizers of the 2024 FIDE World Championship Match, and/or Ding Liren and his official representative(s), however a consensus of credible reporting will also be used.

events.title: Ding Liren plays in 2024 World Chess Championship?
events.description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Ding Liren plays in the World Chess Championship 2024. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

If it is definitively determined/announced that Ding Liren will not participate in the World Chess Championship 2024, this market may immediately resolve to "No". Otherwise, this market will only resolve once Ding Liren plays his first move in the 2024 World Chess Championship.

The primary resolution source for this market will be official information from FIDE, organizers of the 2024 FIDE World Championship Match, and/or Ding Liren and his official representative(s), however a consensus of credible reporting will also be used.

question: Columbia protest cleared by Wednesday?
description:
This market is on the ongoing pro-Palestinian protests at Columbia University, located on the West Lawn in front of Butler Library. 

This market will resolve to “Yes” if the majority of protesters (as of April 22 10 AM ET) are cleared from the West Lawn at any point between April 22, 2024, 10:00 AM ET, and Wednesday, April 24, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to “No”. 

The term 'cleared' includes any action where the majority of protesters are forcibly removed or voluntarily leave the area.  The clearing of protesters which took place on April 18, when dozens of protesters were arrested would qualify for a “Yes” resolution. 

The resolution source for this market will be a consensus of credible reporting.

question: MrBeast biggest YouTube channel by June 30?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if the MrBeast YouTube channel (https://www.youtube.com/@MrBeast) is the largest YouTube channel measured in number of subscribers at any point by June 30, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

The primary resolution source for this market will be official information from YouTube and/or a consensus of credible reporting as to whether MrBeast has become the #1 subscribed to YouTube channel.

events.title: MrBeast biggest YouTube channel by June 30?

question: Israel and Saudi Arabia normalize relations before U.S. election?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if both Israel and the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia officially announce the establishment of diplomatic relations between April 21, and November 4, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No". 

The resolution source for this market will be official information from Israel and the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.

events.title: Israel and Saudi Arabia normalize relations before U.S. election?
events.description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if both Israel and the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia officially announce the establishment of diplomatic relations between April 21, and November 4, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No". 

The resolution source for this market will be official information from Israel and the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.

question: Phantom post "retardio" in April?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if @phantom posts/tweets the word "retardio", between April 21, 2024, 10 AM ET and April 30, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

For the purposes of this market, all quote and reply posts/tweets count toward a "Yes" resolution, but reposts/retweets will not count.

Pluralization/possessive of the word, as well as variance in capitalizations will count toward the resolution of this market, however variant spellings of the word "retardio" will not.

Only the clearly delineated word “retardio”, spelled in that manner (permitting for pluralization/possessive of the word, as well as variance in capitalizations), will count for this market to resolve to “Yes”. Other and extraneous symbols being inserted into the word (ex: r3t@rd1o) will count as a variant spelling, and will not result in a "Yes" resolution.

The resolution source for this market will be Phantom's verified X/Twitter account: https://twitter.com/phantom

Please note, only the @phantom verified X/Twitter account counts for this market, regardless of the URL for this profile. If Phantom posts/tweets from another account, it has no bearing on the resolution of this market.

question: Will MrBeast's next video be 30+ minutes?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if MrBeast's first video released on his official YouTube channel after April 21, 2024, 5:00 PM ET is 30 minutes or longer. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

If MrBeast has not released a new video on his official YouTube channel before July 31, 2024, 11:59 PM ET, this market will resolve to "No".

The resolution source for this market is MrBeast's official YouTube channel: https://www.youtube.com/@MrBeast

events.title: Will MrBeast's next video be 30+ minutes?
